Title: Authorizes the state mortgage agency to purchase veterans' assisted forward commitment mortgages from banks within the state
Summary: Authorizes the state mortgage agency to purchase veterans' assisted forward commitment mortgages from banks within the state; requires the board of directors of the state mortgage agency to establish income limits for eligible veterans from time to time.
LawCode: Add ยง2405-g, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing the state of New York mortgage agency to purchase veterans' assisted forward commitment mortgages from banks within the state
